text: Pleasanton is a city in Alameda County, California, incorporated in 1894. It is a suburb in the San Francisco Bay Area. It is about east of Oakland, and west of Livermore. The population was 79,871 at the 2020 census. Pleasanton was ranked number 4 in USA Today's list of "America's 50 best cities to live in" in 2014, number 63 in Money list of "The Best Places to Live" in 2010, and was named one of "Americans' Top Hometown Spots" in the United States in 2009 by Forbes. Pleasanton was named the third richest city in terms of earnings in the United States by NerdWallet in 2013. == References == == Other websites == * * Alameda County Fairgrounds * Tri-Valley Community Television (TV30) * 101.7 KKIQ * Pleasanton Weekly * Tri-Valley Herald Online Edition * Contra Costa Times (parent of Valley Times) * Pleasanton Patch, local newspaper * Pleasanton Downtown Category:1890s establishments in California Category:1894 establishments in the United States Category:Cities in the San Francisco Bay Area Category:Settlements in Alameda County, California
title: Pleasanton, California
